name: Rock From Hell
description:
Rock From Hell is an rhythm guitar simulation experience you have never seen before! Enjoy a good music and play the good rock'n roll. Use your analog controller and hit the right note in the right time. With Rock From Hell you become a rock star!

The game is at an early stages and all opinions are welcome and will help guide the process of creating this new rhythm game.

Upcoming updates include:

- New musics.

- Guitar customizations.

- Menus with full controller compatibility.

- An open-world city with a hellish history.

Models CC-BY:

Bass: PandaPaw
Guitar Amplifier: Weeklyblend
Eletric Keyboard: dirato2000
Stage: MEC CAD
Logo Designed by Freepik
